spec_data.Name: perl-DBI-Coro
spec_data.Description:
This is an experimental asynchronous DBD::Gofer stream transport for DBI
implemented on top of Coro. The BIG WIN from using Coro is that it enables
the use of existing DBI frameworks like DBIx::Class.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 17 Aug 2017 05:33:56 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Asynchronous DBD::Gofer stream transport using Coro
